title: May be I get my answers
selftext:
I'm serching for some atheist PPL with respect for a servey if u guys participate this I'm really greatful to u guys pls help me

As a part of my Academic curriculum, I'm completing a dissertation by conducting a study on *'Intellectual Humility and Social Desirability in Atheists and Theists across Educational Levels'* I would be really grateful to youğŸ¥¹ if you can take out 5-10 minutes of your time and help me by filling out the form attached to the link below:
https://forms.gle/PQKKoTTTXVNEhkLm6 ğŸ‹

Help me understand the role of religion in India and how it affects people's behaviour. The results shall be shared with you (if you're interested! ğŸ˜¬) upon the completion of the study.

Shukriya ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³
